abilities.name: Glacial Cascade
about: Icicles emerge from the ground in a series of small bursts, each damaging enemies

abilities.name: Fireball
about: Unleashes a ball of fire towards a target which explodes, damaging nearby foes

abilities.name: Earthquake
about: Smashes the ground, dealing damage in an area and cracking the earth. The crack will erupt in a powerful aftershock after a duration.
